hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo "===================ENVIRONMENT===================" env echo "================================================="
MISSING=false if [ -z $RUNNING_USER ]; then echo 'Missing $RUNNING_USER' MISSING=true fi if [ -z $RUNNING_HOST ]; then echo 'Missing $RUNNING_HOST' MISSING=true fi
if [ -z $HOST_SCRIPT_DIR ]; then echo 'Missing $HOST_SCRIPT_DIR' MISSING=true fi
if [ $MISSING == true ]; then exit 1 fi
